name: keepass.io
description: Node.js library for reading and writing KeePass databases
author: Pascal Mathis <dev@snapserv.net> (https://www.pascalmathis.com)

scripts.install: (node-gyp rebuild 2>&1) || (echo 'DO NOT WORRY ABOUT THESE MESSAGES. KEEPASS.IO WILL FALLBACK TO SLOWER NODE.JS METHODS, SO THERE ARE NO LIMITATIONS EXCEPT SLOWER PERFORMANCE.'; exit 0)
